/usr/bin/g++  -g   CMakeFiles/opengl_test.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/opengl_test.dir/src/glad.c.o CMakeFiles/opengl_test.dir/src/displayer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/opengl_test.dir/src/point_producer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/opengl_test.dir/src/event.cpp.o CMakeFiles/opengl_test.dir/src/voronoi_diagram.cpp.o CMakeFiles/opengl_test.dir/src/fortune_algorithm.cpp.o  -o opengl_test -lglfw /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGL.so -ldl
